1. Download the rarfix

2. Copy the rarfix (omi-ufc67b.r39) into youre UFC.67.All.Or.Nothing.PPV.DSR.XviD-OMiCRON\CD2 folder.

The rar fix is simply one rar file in 2nd video who was corrupted and needs replacement for beeing able to extract it.
